introduction.title: Hey, my name is Eduardo Skieres!
introduction.text: I've been working as full-stack web developer since 2020.
Passionate about Angular, .NET, and modern architectures, I seek to drive efficiency and innovation in challenging projects.
I combine technical expertise and strategic vision to create scalable, user-centric solutions.
Currently finishing a degree in Systems Analysis and Development at UNIASSELVI.
about.title: Sobre mim
about.description: Eu sou um desenvolvedor full-stack com experiência em Angular, .NET e arquiteturas modernas.
workExperience.title: Experiência Profissional
workExperience.description: Aqui está uma breve descrição da minha experiência profissional:

description.topic: Development and maintenance of a JavaScript script for the setup and display of programmatic media, integrated with a .NET API.
Implementation of new features in an internal system using Angular and .NET Core.
Creation of an internal system using Angular and .NET APIs, integrated with SSO (Single Sign-On).
Development of an e-commerce platform for registered customers, using Angular and integration with an ERP via REST API.
Maintenance and implementation of features in a Flutter app for delivery riders, including route management and payments.

education.degrees.institution: Centro Universitário Leonardo da Vinci - UNIASSELVI
Escola Técnica Estadual Monteiro Lobato - CIMOL
